column4: how can I erase the temporary files from firefox? I used the option in tools - clear private data, but when I need to download an attachment from my mail a message appears asking to free some space...
I tried BleachBit for a while, it is not a sponsored thing, but it worked for me.
is that another browser, or a tool to delete temporary files?
It is a utility to delete/erase files in files in that and other stuff, use with caution.
